description:
Repost from @reopen.california
•
GAVI and MasterCard team up to test vaccine compliance data storage linked to cashless payment. 
The plans for us are truly frightening and include: constant tracking, vaccine records linked to payment ability, medical records, specifically vaccine records linked to facial recognition software, and from what it sounds like, precrime tracking where persons who are LIKELY to contract Covid (????) will be identified, tracked and monitored. 
I want to tell you all something... you must have a strong resolve to refuse vaccines. I have been in this fight since 2015. It’s easy to say “I’ll never take their covid vaccine”. But when you are faced with loss of school, sports, possible employment or rights to travel, what will you do? Leaving California will not help. This is coming to every state. It’s time for us to start planning and taking action steps right NOW! I have signed up with makeamericansfreeagain.com as a volunteer to coordinate and mentor homeschoolers. All skills and talents are needed. We need big numbers in order to mobilize against this plan against us. Please share!! Bless you all and I value every single one of you in this community!!
*
*
*
#covid19 #coronavirus #vaccine #gavi #health #freedom #truth #justice #bigpharma #gates #killbill #nanotechnology #silentwar #knowledgeispower #fight #wakeup #trump #quarantine #lockdown #conservative #psychologicalwarfare #psyop #firefauci #fraud #pray #plandemicmovie #protest #marxist #communism #trump #deepstate
